about_the_game:
Don't like visual novels? This game is for you!⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀▓▓▓▓▓
Connoisseur of the genre? Even more so!
▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓

MOOD -  is a dark visual novel with elements of psychological horror and a bit of humor. The player will meet a girl and take a little walk with her. Nothing bad will happen, we promise.

PLOT.

My endlessly steady journey from work to home and back. This city has never given me bright colors and happy memories. However, the usual order of things is disturbed by a sudden headache, which eventually led to an unusual acquaintance. Will this meeting be a new beginning? Or will it turn out to be my worst mistake? There's nothing to lose anyway.

EVERY CHOICE IS WRONG.

The game doesn't have “right” endings or choices. A good intention can turn out to be a bad one in the future, just as a bad deed can turn out to be the safest. Make choices with your heart, show her the real you.⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀▓▓▓▓▓
Did we mention that every choice affects the environment? Oops…

GLOOMY SURROUNDINGS.

Clouds overhead and dirty snow underfoot. The game's locations reflect the realities of provincial post-CIS cities. Our story begins in one of them. Not the most cheerful landscape, is it?
Every scene is inspired by real-life streets.

GAME FEATURES:

  • A unique visual style done in the “dirty” shades of a winter city.

  • Melancholic and gloomy soundtrack, in the genres of Dark Ambient, Post-punk and Witch House.

  • 4k artwork with incredible detail.

  • Locations tell their own story and immerse you in the LORE, just look closely.

  • An environment that changes depending on hidden scale.

  • 110+ variations of dialogue.

  • New content on re-runs.

  • ▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓

  • You can steal beer and smoke cigarettes! Lots of cigarettes!

  • Hand-drawn art. No AI.
        

    This game is not recommended for those under the age of 20.
